content.html: Ha! Newsletters with no followers are so last year. What you need is a text-only Gemini site with no visitors. Mine's at gemini://fras.xyz (and yes, you need a special browser to access it, just to make it even more difficult for people to visit)
content.text:
Ha! Newsletters with no followers are so last year. What you need is a text-only Gemini site with no visitors. 

Mine's at gemini://fras.xyz (and yes, you need a special browser to access it, just to make it even more difficult for people to visit)

content.html: I listen to audio books when I'm in my art room but podcasts are a big no no. I've not found one single one that doesn't start with "Hi there, this week I've been..." At that point I turn it off. I don't want to know about them . I want to learn about the subject advertised.
content.text: I listen to audio books when I'm in my art room but podcasts are a big no no. I've not found one single one that doesn't start with "Hi there, this week I've been..." At that point I turn it off. I don't want to know about them . I want to learn about the subject advertised.

content.html: Audiobooks are great aren‚Äôt they and I‚Äôve been listening to some recently by @TheMontyDon @fugueur via @audibleuk - ‚ÄúThis Other London‚Äù I‚Äôve got in Kindle form and audiobook. Often find they are great accompaniments for long drives but not walks. I prefer just the sound of nature
